title: How Carroll Shelby Beat Enzo Ferrari -- /ROAD TESTAMENT
description: Road Testament digs into the amazing story of how the late Carroll Shelby helped Ford unseat Enzo Ferrari as the king of sports-car racing during the mid-1960s. With special guest A.J. Baime, author of "Go Like Hell: Ford, Ferrari and Their Battle For Speed and Glory at Le Mans."
